metadata.synopsis: AD for Havkelaag for when it sees the gith egg destroyed in case plaeyrs drop it from the inventory.and kill it
metadata.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A - Drop the gith egg in front of Havkelaag- Destroy the egg

0.speaker: Havkelaag
0.text: What a tragic loss! Now how will my theory be proven? Woe and alas!
